Sizes.Name: default
Sizes.Description: If you use more than 3 nodes, please select the total number of cores to be used

Sizes.Name: default
Sizes.Description: Scheduler Free level service jobs are computed once every 30 days. All service levels are controlled by the most frequent jobs and limit the number of jobs run. Within the 30-day period, the number of jobs run in reality is limited to: 21.6 million jobs for each Standard unit and 21.6 billion jobs for each Premium unit.

Sizes.Name: default
Sizes.Description: Costs are based on hourly increments. For Standard units, after each group of 10 jobs is created (or portion thereof), the cost is computed and apportioned by the hour. After all regional jobs run have been totaled, the price is computed.

Sizes.Name: default
Sizes.Description: For Premium units, after each group of 10,000 jobs is created (or portion thereof), the cost is computed and apportioned by the hour. After all regional jobs run have been totaled, the price is computed.

Sizes.Name: default
Sizes.Description: For Premium units, after each group of 5,000 jobs is created (or portion thereof), the cost is computed and apportioned by the hour. After all regional jobs run have been totaled, the price is computed.
